transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji, Rajveer ji aapki call hi nahi lag rahi thi.
Customer: Ji boliye na madam.
Executive: Haan. Main main bas aapse ye bol rahi hu main khud aapko solution ke liye hi connect kar rahi hu guide kar rahi hu to aapki jo team ya fir aap kar rahe hain connect to ek bar aap mujhe ye cheez system pe reh kar ke ek bar discuss karega Monday ko aap bata do kis time aapka staff lekin sir available rakhiega.
Customer: Sir main khud hi available rahunga koi dikkat nahi mujhe ye bataye ki jaise maine aapne past leads to batai theek hai past lead check kar raha hu past lead check kar raha hu koi bhi gym setup service ka koi bhi lead nahi hai.
Executive: Maine to aapko dekha tha to usme to lead waha pe dikha rahi thi even 47 second ki bhi dikha raha tha.
Customer: Main past lead me aap filter lagaiye aapka
Executive: Haan past lead me aap filter lagaiye aapka
Customer: Matlab 47 minute pehle jab maine us time aapko call kiya tha tab.
Executive: Koi lead nahi hai madam ho gaya lead khatam koi lead nahi hai gym machine hai ye.
Executive: Filter laga ke aap dekh lo ek bar.
Customer: Filter laga ke aap dekh lo ek bar.
Executive: Wo sabse upar filter rehta hai.
Customer: Jo aapke product relevant product hai na usse related aap waha pe product ko select kar lo.
Executive: Gym setup services.
Customer: Aur usme India ka filter aap laga lo to jo leads aayi hongi overall wo past leads sold out aapko dikha dengi.
Customer: Nahi madam mere ko pata nahi dikh rahi hai mere ko to do hi India ka hi laga rakha hai pura fir bhi gym setup services kuch bhi nahi dikh raha. Ek news complete gym hai aur ek gym part coating. Past lead me
Executive: Ye past lead me hi aap hai.
Customer: Past lead me bhi dekh liya. Kuch bhi nahi hai madam use wahi hai use complete gym past lead me hi dekh raha hu main.
Executive: Haan to aap bata do fir ki aap kis time hoge Monday ko available aap apne staff ko bhi rakhiega apne sath discussion me.
Customer: Main madam 10 se 11 me jab man ji aap phone kar le. Morning morning ke time me 10 se 11. Morning me haan ji morning ke time 10 se 11 aur evening ke time 3 ke baad.
Executive: Achha 3 ke baad. To theek hai main uske according aapko call karungi Monday ko aur aap staff ko karwaiye kuch madam nahi to bilkul staff bhi rahega staff bhi rahega.
Customer: Staff bhi rahega staff bhi rahega.
Executive: Haan sath me rakhiega unko theek hai main aapko accordingly connect kar leti hu maine aapko whatsapp bhi kar diya hai aapne number se.
Executive: To wo save kar lena kyuki Mahima ab hai nahi system me to main dekh rahi hu as a manager aur aapke account manager Kritika hai jinhone shayad aapse baat bhi kari thi abhi kuch time pehle to wo handle kar rahi hai directly aapka account.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji okay sir.
Customer: Haan ji bhaiya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to find gym setup leads.

- Wants resolution for lead visibility issue.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on applying filters.

- Executive scheduled a follow-up call for Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday between 10-11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filter, follow up, resolution
